name: Small Carp
lore: A weak little carp wandering too close to the shore...

name: Golden Minnow
lore: Known for its shimmer, often mistaken for gold by rookies.

name: Bluefin Pike
lore: Usually hides deep underwater. You must be lucky!

name: Elder Leviathan
lore: An ancient beast... some say it chooses who may catch it.
